transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan ji. Very good afternoon sir.
Executive: Sir dekhiye main puchna chahta hun ji abhi actually mere senior ne aapko call kiya tha sir Priyanka mam naam se Priyanka naam hai unka.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To aap please unse call answer kar sakte hain aapko aap keh rahe the na ki senior se baat kara dijiyega nahi to aap mere phone se kar lijiye sir aapko aisa lag raha tha main aapki abhi baat kara du.
Customer: Karao.
Executive: Ek ek minute dijiye.
Customer: Hmm. Main apna call transfer kar raha hun.
Customer: Jaldi karo.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan Priyanka mam kaise ho?
Executive: Haan ji sir main theek hun aap bataye first of all kaise hain sir?
Customer: All good good mam ek na problem aa raha hai jaise na.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Hamara ek na aapke sath response issue aa raha hai response rate hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Theek hai wo pehle tha 87%.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Theek hai wo parso humne check kiya to 87 tha aaj check kiya to 76% hai ye 2% 10% kahan ud gaye ekdum se.
Executive: 80 81% dikh raha hai aaj ki date pe jo main check kar rahi hun.
Customer: 81% dikh raha hai.
Executive: Haan ji wo.
Customer: Mujhe to 76 dikh raha tha mam subah check kiya tha.
Executive: Ji just abhi maine check kiya agar aap apne sub domain pe jaoge to URL pe click karenge to uske baad wahan par show hota hai aur abhi just now 78% ka response rate aapka mujhe show ho raha hai 78% right now.
Executive: 78% dikh raha hai to sir ye response rate aapke call pick up ratio pe dikhta hai jaise last three months ka average nikalta hai ki aapne kitne calls client ke respond kiye us uska ye response rate show hota hai sir wahan pe.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Jaise aapko teen mahine mein 78% dikh raha hai mam mere ko to.
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan ji kya 78% dikh raha hai.
Executive: Right now it's showing 78% sir jitne jyada aap buyer calls respond karoge jaise is week mein aapke pass che call aaye the lekin che mein se sirf do hi call respond hui hai to is vajah se aapka response rate down ho gaya jitna jyada buyer call respond ki jayegi.
Customer: Ji sir yes boliye.
Customer: Mam problem pata hai kya hai hum to koi call miss karte nahi ab man lo customer ne call kiya usne ek miss call mar ke chod diya theek hai wo miss call mein chala jata hai.
Executive: Haan ji sahi baat hai.
Customer: Got my point ki matlab hamare pass to call pahuncha hi nahi na.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To wo immediately wo miss call mein chala jata hai ya man lo network ka kuch problem hai customer wahan se kar raha hai ek customer ne mere ko man lo call kiya to usne dekha bhi network se connect nahi hua usne kata dobara kar diya wo mera miss call mein connect ho gaya.
Executive: Haan wo to sir fir wo due to network issue miss call mein count hi hoga but mera aapse ek request hoga jyada se jyada 100% call answer kariye to automatic aapka response rate.
Customer: Aapko meri baat samajh nahi aa rahi mam main jo keh raha hun.
Executive: Sir mujhe samajh aa rahi hai aapki baat aap jo keh rahe hain.
Customer: Haan to main seedhi seedhi hindi mein samjha raha hun ki dekho customer ne call kiya usne call kiya ekdum se usko kuch yaad aa gaya usne phone kaat diya uski yahan se to call hogi nahi mere yahan pe miss call show kar gayi aur mera response rate kharab ho gaya.
Executive: Sir main man sakti hun waisi char call ho sakti hai sir lekin waisi 10 call nahi ho sakti na sir.
Customer: Aap ye baat samajhiye sir.
Customer: Achcha ek baat batao aap jab office se ghar chale jate ho.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aap personally kisi ko call karte hoge na apne phone se theek hai ya aap metro mein travel kar rahe hote aap phone karte ho kisi ko theek hai to aisa to nahi hai na ki har call aapki pehli bar mein lagti hai kai call aapki miss hoti hai.
Customer: Aap bolte nahi network ka bada problem hai yaar bolte hai na hum log.
Executive: Haan haan haan haan bilkul correct.
Customer: So that is the point ki wo uska to network ka problem ho gaya idhar mera response rate wo kharab aa gaya.
Customer: Aur do calls agar meri sirf kharab hui hai man lo sirf do hi calls meri miss hui hai to do calls ke upar mera 8% response rate kam ho jayega kya?
Executive: Sir agar main is month ki baat karu is month mein che call miss hui hai last month mein aapki do call miss thi to last month aapka response rate best tha badhiya tha matlab agar main is month mein do call miss hui hai to.
Customer: Nahi is month mein six call miss hui hai six call.
Customer: Six calls miss hogi pure month mein.
Executive: Abhi tak November 13th of November aa gaye aapke pass total 15 call aaye the 15 mein se nau call pick hue aur che call miss hue matlab.
Customer: Theek hai aap rakho main sambhal lunga aap rakho aap phone rakho main sambhal lunga theek hai.
Executive: Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's response rate has decreased.

- Missed calls due to network issues affecting response rate.



Resolution:

- Executive explained response rate calculation.

- Executive advised answering more buyer calls.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- response rate, missed calls, network issues, buyer calls
